alert.note: Alert for St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:39PM CDT until July 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL TALLADEGA AND CENTRAL ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 438 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clay to near Lincoln, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Talladega, Pell City, Leeds, Moody, Springville, Odenville, Lincoln, Margaret, Argo, Riverside, Munford, Bald Rock, Talladega Superspeedway, Harrisburg, Branchville, Talladega Municipal Airport, Logan Martin Lake, Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, Country Club Estates and Wattsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
